## Source: amazon-inspector (48612b0b1dd13d62c19284c76e6d5c16b29512f42c35ba20ad6243ba89c6d647)
The package karemm1 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (0f87456104eeeb78cac0cdb21d017530153ecae93b9e675b0d14f83d365c7b45)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'karemm1' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
